data.enText: a member of a religious group of men who often live apart from other people in a monastery and who do not marry or have personal possessions

tr: a male religious living in a cloister and devoting himself to contemplation and prayer and work

value.def: A monk is a member of a male religious community that is usually separated from the outside world.

example.tran: 身着藏红色僧袍的佛教僧侣

trans: 防彈武僧；防弹武僧；无敌武僧；防弹神僧；武僧
蒙克；塞隆尼斯·孟克；塞隆尼斯孟克；瑟隆尼斯孟克
濟公；济公；魔僧；疯狂修士
